item.title: burp-browser-profiles
item.description: burp-browser-profiles is a small shell script utility that will help you make better use of the embedded browser that comes by default with Burp. This is heavily inspired by PwnFox, I wanted to have a similar tool to use with the embedded Burp browser Features: -allows you to create and maintain multiple Burp browser profiles -allows you to run multiple Burp browser instances at the same time with different profiles

item.title: 4 hackers, one XSS challenge!
item.description: In april I recorded myself solving the monthly Intigriti challenge, some parts from the recordings got featured in a video on the official Intigriti Youtube channel. I have to say, it is surprisingly dificult to narate and record yourself trying to figure out a vulnerability :) Thank you Intigriti for the opportunity!
